EmailTemplate.subject: Final chance! $25 Amazon Gift Card for Completing a 4-min survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/2TY3LN7]]> We'd love to hear about your cloud migration and optimization strategy! Complete our 4-minute survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/2TY3LN7]]> and as our way of saying thanks, we'll send you a $25 Amazon Gift Card.
Get Started Here <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/2TY3LN7]]>
